author: Carlos Nshimba
comment: Wonderful App! i only use the website on my laptop when i need to increase limits and the likes, otherwise i do 99% of my banking on the app. i hate going to the bank, and  with this app, the bank is always with me.  I understand the frustrations of some users. sometimes the problem is not with the technology itself, but us as users need to learn how to better use it. I think the team developing this app should be given a bell! Fantastic job, and keep it up.

reply.author: FNB
reply.content:
Hi Carlos,

I value your constructive feedback immensely. Thanks! Have a lovely day :)

Kind Regards,
RB Jacobs

author: Kendall Meuskens
comment: Very convenient app, quick and easy banking when I'm on the go. My one complaint is that the Login button is not placed under the password field like normal, it is hidden (under your hand) at the bottom of the screen! I have pressed the 'Login as another user' button so many times it's not funny. I mean, it's RIGHT THERE!

author: Hennie Botha
comment: I have a new Samsung Note8 and I can't get fingerprint sign in activated or setup FNB pay. I get an error that my phone is not compatible. I phoned the banking app support team but they was not much help. Is there a way to get this issue escalated?

reply.author: FNB
reply.content:
Hi Hennie,

Please share the App Team's feedback with me so that we can take it from there.

Kind Regards,
RB Jacobs

comment: The App is fine but am dissapointed that they sent  sms saying I can reverse some unauthorized  payments  but I don't see these icons on  the app. Apparently  I must update the App but I cannot see how to do that.

author: Nadeemah Regal
comment: The FNB Pay option is still missing on NFC-enabled Huawei devices. There needs to be an easier way to verify the app. I have changed devices a few times, and can no longer verify new devices.

author: Yvonne Larbie
comment: Only issue is that I don't and items under the My vouchers and the app is up to date. Some people have it some don't and I can't understand why.

author: no frog
comment: Fnb is best bank in South Africa so far what i like about this bank is that when criminals take your money without your permission you have an  option to reverse it back by using this app no need to go to the branch and stop them for future deduction it happens to me many times

author: mindseed design
comment: Best bank and banking app in South Africa. Closed my Absa account after 20 years. FNB is excellent

author: Kabelo Kgare
comment: It is a great app, but now with this update, I can no longer view my card pin if I forgot it, if you guys have removed it for security reasons, then have it request five different passwords for the user/ account holder to get to view the pin, please.

author: Elizabeth Diamante
comment: I uninstalled my app because it was not working.  I downloaded it again but it keeps loading and loading forever. Now I want to use it.  What do i do ? Should i really keep installing it and uninstalling it for it to work for me ? I dont like it.

author: Bartłomiej Karbowy
comment: Fingerprint login no longer working on Sony Xperia xz1 with Android 8.0.0. Otherwise OK, although app's look is bit outdated.

author: Aren Comley
comment: Fnb pay is not listed on my device. What the point of making a big fuss when the feature does not work on the latest samsung device

author: Dilan Rigby
comment: I dont receive my OTP. Fingerprint sign in also jus stopped working. Just terrible

author: Thembile Tshabalala
comment: This app Used to be on point, now i can't even access my funds in my 32days notice, all of a sudden I have limits that I have never set and I have to go to the bank to sort all of this out.

author: Mario Marinus
comment: Vastly improved great control over finances. One of the best!

reply.author: FNB
reply.content:
Hi Mario,

Love your feedback, thanks!

Kind Regards,
RB

author: Navin Maharajh
comment: I am using my cell phone to install this app. Now y ask me for a one time pin. How do I get that from the same phone

reply.author: FNB
reply.content:
Hi Navin,

Sorry about the hassle. Please speak directly with the App Team on 087 575 0362 so they can guide you through the process.

Kind Regards,
RB Jacobs

reply.content:

Kind Regards,
RB Jacobs

author: Reward Emeka
comment: This is clearly the best banking app. I've been using it for some years now, I can't even remember the last time I visited a branch.  It keeps on getting better and better  with new features unlike other banks that has so many different apps for different things, everything you want to do is in one app. IT IS ALL IN ONE...!   FNB is really a smart bank for smart people.

reply.author: FNB
reply.content:
Hi Reward,

Thanks so much for the amazing feedback! It really warms my heart :) I'll make sure the App Team sees it too.

Kind Regards,
RB Jacobs
